sentence.Network_en: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

sentence.Network_en: The idea of fighting against men of their own race was hateful to them.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到要同本族人交战他们就十分难受。

sentence.Network_en: A hateful person is one that arouses feelings of hatred in you.
sentence.Network_cn: 可憎之人就是会使你产生憎恨之情的人.

entry.tran: 极坏的;可恶的;令人讨厌的
entry.def: Someone or something that is hateful is extremely bad or unpleasant.

example.ex: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
example.tran: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

entry.tran: 心怀仇恨的;充满憎恨的
entry.def: Someone who is hateful hates someone else.

example.ex: These are not necessarily hateful, malicious people.
example.tran: 这些人不一定心怀仇恨，恶意伤人。
充满谎言、仇恨和种族主义情绪的运动

sentences.sentence: "no vice is universally as hateful as ingratitude"- Joseph Priestly

auth_sentence.content: But it's hateful that they're so special.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it's hateful that they're so special.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it's hateful that they're so special.

auth_sentence.content: Ah, Gloucester, hide thee from their hateful looks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ah, Gloucester, hide thee from their hateful looks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ah, Gloucester, hide thee from their hateful looks.

auth_sentence.content: He...allowed his army to commit all the excesses that are particularly hateful.
auth_sentence.res_content: He...allowed his army to commit all the excesses that are particularly hateful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...allowed his army to commit all the excesses that are particularly hateful.

sentences.en: A hateful person is one that arouses feelings of hatred in you.
sentences.cn: 可憎之人就是会使你产生憎恨之情的人。

sentences.en: She could hardly spit out the hateful words.
sentences.cn: 她恼怒得几乎无法骂出那句充满恨意的话来。
